name: Scarf Cat Game (Ultimate Edition)
description:
Welcome to Scarf Cat Game, Understated Edition!

THE STORY

You're a cat. That lovely orange cat nearby seems to want something. Better go talk to them and find out?

NOTES

* You can use mouse buttons for attack and using items, but the mouse itself doesn't do anything. Don't bother clicking on stuff - nothing will happen.

* The pause system is still pretty buggy. Ideally don't use it if you don't have to - but if you do and it crashes, please let me know where and when!

* Controller support is also slightly wonky. You'll need to use the D-pad to navigate in menus, for example.

2.1 Release Notes

 - Fixed a bug wherein a character froze if hit with an arrow

 - Assorted balance tweaks

 - Clarified one quest progression slightly

 - Minor bugfixes

 - Removed Herobrine

Attributions

All music by Kevin McLeod

"Bleeping Demo", "Blippy Trance", "Cruising for Goblins", "Exit the Premises", "Overworld", "Tiki Bar Mixer", "Townie Loop", "Video Dungeon Boss"

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
